_sText:
De_terminus was my first defuse map , i did it about 2 and half year now.
For de_terminus2 i decided to completly remake that map : a new design and a new gameplay.
The map is bigger (40 spawns) , more detailled, and i hope it's more fun to play.

The action take place in a very old russian train terminus. 
The terrorists have to blown one of the two bomb sites, an industrial train for the site B , a subway station for the site A.
The CT must prevent terrorists from bombing the 2 sites. Team members must defuse any bombs that threaten those targets.

i wish to thank the brakass team for testing, moroes for his ideas and help.

Ph3nYx
